name: Value (UpsideDownBird)
description: Value is a Roguelike with procedurally generated maps where there is only one value. This acts as health, ammo and money; when it hits 0 you die. Throughout the game, you will navigate a variety of rooms, and pick up various weapons and items each with their own strengths and weaknesses and face off against a boss battle. The value depicted in the upper left corner represents everything, your health, energy,  currency and  ammo. Find the store keeper for an extra boost. Good luck and may the odds be in your favor.
